programme.desc: Jason Priestley stars in this inspirational adventure story about courage, love and the power of family.

programme.title: Accidentally In Love
programme.desc: Edie discovers love in London days before leaving for the US. Fate reunites them six years later.

programme.title: Christmas in the City
programme.desc: Wendy and her daughter head to the city to make enough money to save her father's candy store from closing.

programme.title: Saving Christmas Spirit
programme.desc: An archaeology professor travels to Scotland in search of an ancient shrine but finds more than she bargained for when a handsome Whiskey brewer offers to be her tour guide.

programme.title: Christmas on Chestnut Street
programme.desc: Three couples find their destinies irrevocably intertwined in a fusion of obsession and fragile love when a six-year-old girl finds a junkie's discarded needle while playing in her backyard.

programme.desc: When an EVP inherits a manor, he's expected to host his family for Christmas.

programme.title: Coming Home for Christmas

programme.title: Buried Secrets
programme.desc: A cop-turned-writer creates suspicion when she publishes her first novel.

programme.title: New Dogs, Old Tricks
programme.desc: Sarah searches for her missing roommate. Jay endures Petes revenge as Kappa Psi sisters prep for Gamma Fair.

programme.title: Three Dates to Forever
programme.desc: When John's new dating app pairs him with radio host Maddie, sparks start to fly.

programme.title: Eat, Love, London
programme.desc: Stella takes a job at a new London restaurant and ends up falling for the chef.

programme.title: A Royal Makeover
programme.desc: When Ramone discovers he is about to be King, he takes lessons from royal expert Angelica.

programme.title: A Match for the Prince
programme.desc: A matchmaker risks falling for a real-life prince before his royal wedding date.

programme.title: Campus Caller
programme.desc: When a university student goes missing, her mother a former cop goes in search for her.

programme.title: Meet Me in New York
programme.desc: Events planner Kelly meets her match in web editor Joe when planning his niece's birthday party.

programme.title: Christmas Casanova
